hero.title: Protect Your Harvest Before It's Too Late
hero.subtitle: Farmers lose thousands of kilograms every year due to unseen humidity, bad storage, and sudden weather changes. Our system watches conditions and gives early warnings so you save more grain.

problem.title: The Silent Problem After Harvest
problem.p1: Most farmers lose crop value due to moisture, insects, and poor storage conditions—often without knowing the real reason.
problem.stat1_sub: Average grain spoilage in many areas
problem.stat2_sub: Farmers rarely get real-time storage alerts
problem.stat3_sub: Weather changes affect grains every hour

how.title: How This Helps Farmers
how.step1_sub: Just choose crop type and basic storage info.
how.step2_sub: Temperature, humidity, and rain probability checked every hour.
how.step4_sub: Reduce spoilage and protect months of effort.

story.title: A Farmer’s Before & After Journey

story.after: After: Simple alerts and advice helped save grain and improve income.
